title: Mysteries of the Eastern Lands
description: The ancient war has finally come to an end, bringing a peaceful closure to the chaotic dispute of the Ancient Dragon Battlefield. Its prisoners along with their mysterious foes returning to the realm of the forgotten. Feng Yu, who had returned to Eastern Lands of the Bright Flame Kingdom, must now embark on an adventure towards the home of his companion Lang Kuang. However, though this journey is but a prelude towards their quest to the desolate and chaotic Southern Wastelands of the True Yuan Continent. They would find that this travel, is filled with more obstacles and mysteries than they'd ever perceive...
author: Shadows Finger
